Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/178790

comment.body:
As I see, it's caused by `EasyList Czech and Slovak`. You can add this rule to user rules or disable the filter until it's fixed by its author.
```adblock
||aktualne.cz^$csp=child-src *,badfilter
```

pull_request.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/pull/185576#discussion_r1705536088

# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [x] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

<https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/pull/185576#discussion_r1705536088>

### Add your comment and screenshots

This pull request restores filters that were mistakenly deleted and additionally blocks tracking parameters for related site.
EDIT: Fixed my mistake on parameter.

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![タイトルなし](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/bb297a9c-24b6-4b7f-b52c-25fdcab4bdd2)

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body:
Всем привет!
Кроме Я.Браузера такая же ерунда проявляется и в Chrome. В Я.Браузере встроенный блокировщик отключен, а в Chrome такого функционала нет.
Заметил такую закономерность. 
Если выключить ADGuard, то проблема остается до закрытия вкладки, обновление страницы не помогает. Если же вкладку со страницей закрыть и зайти в новой вкладке, то страница начинает отображаться нормально (но с рекламой). 
И будет работать даже при включенном ADGuard-е, до тех пор, пока эту вкладку не закроешь.

comment.body: Не-не, я на Яндексе снова сейчас, вышел и залогинился повторно, картинка прогружается. Просто задержка почему-то была — сам сайта грузился быстро, но картинка грузилась в конце и не прогружалась. DNS-защиту отключил, прокешировалось, потом снова включил и сейчас грузится. Не знаю, что было. Спасибо впрочем за внимание и за понимание со скриншотами тоже.

comment.body:
> скорее всего проблема не в DNS (у меня DNS Яндекса по DoH, тут указано), просто сейчас я везде авторизовываюсь после чистки кешей, куки и DNS кэша винды, поставил DNS Яндекса и все сайты пока что медленно грузятся, но временно, такое у меня бывало на кастомных DNS, сейчас я разлогинился на Ali, снова авторизовался, попробовал DNS Cloudflare и картинка прорисовалась

Видел, но тоже проверяем с нашим на всякий случай. Возможно у яндекс днс есть проблемы раз помогла смена на Cloudflare с очисткой кэшей.

---

Скриншоты удалил. Рад слышать, что все стало нормально.

comment.body:
Hello, this issue is caused by `Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List` - third-party filter and we won't be able to fix it directly. You can add these rules to user rules.
```
youtube.com#@#div[class$=-gradient-bottom]
youtube.com#@#head:has(meta[property$=":video:url"]) + body div[class$=-gradient-bottom]
```

@DandelionSprout could you take a look please?

comment.body: Я дико извиняюсь, пришлось восстановить свой акк здесь на github, но скорее всего проблема не в DNS (у меня DNS Яндекса по DoH, тут указано), просто сейчас я везде авторизовываюсь после чистки кешей, куки и DNS кэша винды, поставил DNS Яндекса и все сайты пока что медленно грузятся, но временно, такое у меня бывало на кастомных DNS, сейчас я разлогинился на Ali, снова авторизовался, попробовал DNS Cloudflare и картинка прорисовалась. Просто вначале, когда я только заходил, почему-то не работало. Наверно можно запрос закрывать, или ещё лучше удалить, потому что я забыл затереть своё местоположение на картинках. Если удалить нельзя, можете затереть сами или напишите мне в ЛС @zloyden, я отправлю вам поправленные картинки куда захотите.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/178790

1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/178790

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/180794) if other issue.

Hello, tried to reproduce your problem on several types of players, but the popups did not play. Could you  try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update?
Do not close AdGuard window 30-60 seconds.

comment.body:
Понял. Значит будем отключать каждый раз.Пытался через белый список так же попробовать - не сработало. И приношу свои извинения за прошлый резкий ответ - случилось под «горячую руку».7 авг. 2024 г., в 16:17, Alex ***@***.***> написал(а):﻿
@p1mk3r Сам проверить не могу. Некоторые банковские приложения действуют аналогично. И не важно - реальный ВПН или локальный (как в случае с Адгардом при использовании фильтрации DNS - трафик не маршрутизируется на наши серверы). Если выключите фильтрацию DNS - проблема скорее всего решится.
Можете проверить с любым ВПН с не-российской локацией.

В общем, статистику себе улучшаете, всё понятно.

Патчить приложения мы не можем. Apple даже не разрешает фильтрацию HTTPS.

—Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or unsubscribe.You are receiving this because you were mentioned.Message ID: ***@***.***>

comment.body:
@p1mk3r Сам проверить не могу. Некоторые банковские приложения действуют аналогично. И не важно - реальный ВПН или локальный (как в случае с Адгардом при использовании фильтрации DNS - трафик не маршрутизируется на наши серверы). Если выключите фильтрацию DNS - проблема скорее всего решится.
Можете проверить с любым ВПН с не-российской локацией. 

> В общем, статистику себе улучшаете, всё понятно.

Патчить приложения мы не можем. Apple даже не разрешает фильтрацию HTTPS.

comment.body:
Не повторяется. Мы блокируем попап с баннером приложения, и при этом разблокируем прокрутку.
Попробуйте добавить в пользовательский фильтр правило:
`aminoapps.com#%#//scriptlet('trusted-set-cookie', 'call2action_closed', '1')`
